Description.Name: Rapid-Fire AC/2 Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Rounds designed specifically for rapid-fire autocannons to withstand the weapon's high rate of fire. They're ideal for saturating targets and disrupting fast-moving units.

Rapid-Fire AC/2 half-capacity bins each contain 225 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
